Un dels menors detinguts el 18-O a la Via Laietana es querella contra la policia per maltractaments
El jove denuncia vexacions i cops durant el seu arrest i a la Prefectura de Policia

05 Nov 2019, 14:29

Un dels joves detinguts durant les mobilitzacions de la vaga general del 18 d'octubre ha presentat una querella contra vuit agents de la Policia Nacional per maltractaments i vexacions en el moment del seu arrest i durant la seva estada a la Prefectura Superior de Policia de Barcelona, on el van portar arrestat. Es tracta d'un menor de 16 anys que els agents van arrestar a la capçalera de la manifestació a la Via Laietana. El moment del seu arrest –amb ell vestit amb una dessuadora de color taronja i amb diversos agents a sobre– va ser enregistrat per diversos mitjans de comunicació i va ser una de les imatges de la jornada.
El menor està acusat d'atemptat i desordres, però la seva advocada, Norma Pedemonte, considera que les imatges desmenteixen aquestes acusacions. Des d'Alerta Solidària, el col·lectiu que n'ha assumit la defensa, consideren que el cas del Guillem exemplifica les vulneracions de drets que "de manera sistemàtica i premeditada" van exercir els agents durant aquella jornada, en paraules del portaveu de l'entitat, Xavier Pellicer.




Un dels menors detinguts el 18-O a la Via Laietana es querella contra la policia per maltractaments / ACN

Pellicer ha advertit que aniran "fins a les últimes conseqüències jurídiques" per denunciar aquestes vulneracions i ha insistit en demanar que s'assumeixin "responsabilitats polítiques" pel dispositiu policial des de la Generalitat i per part de l'Estat.

One of the minors detained on 18-O on Via Laietana is sued against the police for ill-treatment
The young person denounces humiliations and strikes during his arrest and the Police Prefecture

05 Nov 2019, 14:29

One of the detainees during the demonstrations of the general strike of October 18 has filed a complaint against eight agents of the National Police for ill-treatment and humiliation at the time of his arrest and during his stay at the Superior Police Office of Barcelona , where he was arrested. It is a minor of 16 years that the agents arrested at the head of the demonstration on Via Laietana. The moment of his arrest - he dressed in an orange sweatshirt and with several agents on it - was recorded by various means of communication and was one of the images of the day.
The minor is charged with an attack and disorder, but his lawyer, Norma Pedemonte, believes that the images deny these allegations. From Alerta Solidaria, the group that has assumed the defense, consider that the case of Guillem exemplifies the violations of rights that "officially and premeditated" exercised the agents during that day, in the words of the spokesman of the entity, Xavier Pellicer.




One of the minors detained on 18-O on Via Laietana is suing against the police for ill-treatment / ACN

Pellicer has warned that they will "go to the latest legal consequences" to report these violations and insisted on demanding that "political responsibilities" be assumed by the police device from the Generalitat and from the State.
